issues_found.issue: Missing execution block for the company.
issues_found.quote:
Individual shareholder                                                                         
Name: Ahmed Kareem Al Mansoori
Passport/ID: UAE Passport No. U12345678
Address: Unit 1208, Al Sila Tower, Al Maryah Island,
Abu Dhabi, UAE
Signature: _______________________
Date: 10 August 2025
Place of signing: Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
issues_found.suggestion: Include a section for the company to execute the resolution, including signature, date, and place of signing by an authorised signatory.
issues_found.rationale: Resolutions require formal execution by the company to evidence their adoption.
issues_found.citation: There is no explicit rule requiring execution blocks but this is implied by standard corporate practices.

issues_found.quote: FURTHER RESOVED, that Ahmed Kareem Al Mansoori (UAE Passport No. U12345678) is, and each acting alone is, hereby authorized to do and perform any and all such acts, including execution of any and all documents, as said person shall deem necessary or advisable, to carry out the purposes of the foregoing resolutions.
issues_found.rationale: Spelling mistakes can undermine the document.
issues_found.citation: There is no explicit rule requiring error free documents, but this is implied by standard corporate practices.
